title: Ranked promotion bug on multiple occassions

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
Have riot changed the rules for promotional games? On multiple occasions I have won one game and lost the next to then be told that my promotional series has failed. Do you need to go 2-0 now?
I have a linked my most recent games, the leona jungle game was my first win and the nocturne game my first loss. Promo failed. Again.
Note: Want to make sure its not a new feature before i log another bug report

replies.body: Looks like it worked the second time :D Not sure what happened there. We've had someone with a similar issue here today as well, it's very possible that it's actually a bug.
